string.text:
One of the last of these magazines to be printed before their switch to a digital version. Unlike soviet magazines of the same kind that are often found in the Zone, it does not look like it has been through hell and back. Besides a few missing pages, it is almost complete. It probably found its way in the Zone from mercs, they've been known to import western goods lately.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] imported

An old Xbox magazine, dating back from 2002. It's the first issue released in the UK. Some sections of the magazine are missing, but at least one review remained complete.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] imported

An old Xbox magazine, dating back from 2004. It's the 36th issue released in the UK. Some sections of the magazine are missing, but at least one review remained complete.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] imported

Strana Igr (Russian: —трана игр, Gameland) was a Russian magazine focused on video games. It was published by Gameland between January 1996 and November 2013 when the magazine was suspended due to financial problems. It's a bit odd that such a magazine found its way into the Zone. Perhaps after western goods became more and more present in the Zone, Russian speakers grew an interest for western culture?
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] imported

European Car was an American automotive enthusiast magazine published by the Motor Trend Group. The magazine was in circulation between 1978 and 2018. Many mercs came into the Zone with these magazines, to give them distraction on the hard days.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] imported

Evo is a British automobile magazine dedicated to performance cars. These magazines are more and more commonly found in the Zone, most likely because it gives a taste of the outside world to those stuck here.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] Х %c[ui_gray_2] imported
